steps.title: Basic Info
steps.content:
This Page allows you to manage Department Quotations, by providing classified view for Quotations as:
  • Drafts
  • Submitted
  • Redesign
  • Approved
  • Cancelled
and provides an easy and managable interface to handle Quotations from its origin till its Completely Processed.

steps.title: Draft Tab
steps.content:
This Tab provides facility for creating Drafts in favour of Quotations. Drafts are the documents, created at initial states of Framing Quotations that have not been submitted, yet, in the company for processing.

The Drafts, made by a Person are visible to the Person Itself only.

steps.title: Submitted Tab
steps.content:
Once the draft for the Quotation has been submitted by the you for approval, it appears in the Submitted Tab.

Submitted Quotations, are visible to the person, who submitted the Quotation, and to its Senior authority as well.

steps.title: Approved Tab
steps.content: Once the Quotation has been approved by the Senior authorit(y/ies), it appears in the Approved Tab. It also provides the facility for directly sending the Quotation to the Client via Mail, etc.

steps.title: Redesign Tab
steps.content: This tab contains the Quotations that have been temporarily postponed for approval by the authority for some corrections or further alterations and needs to be revisited.

steps.title: Cancelled Tab
steps.content: This tab keeps track of Quotations that were either cancelled by the Lead/Customer or pemanently rejected by the Authority.
